## ChatCore.getNextMessage() method

Make a request to Chat API to generate the next message.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getNextMessage(request: MessageRequest): Promise<MessageResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [MessageRequest](./chat-core.messagerequest.md) | request to get next message |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[MessageResponse](./chat-core.messageresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

If rejected, an [ApiError](./chat-core.apierror.md) is returned.
